name: Minus
description:
Can you escape a city where you will be hunted?

Minus is a 2d platformer in a dystopian world where every life has a value. If it becomes negative, these humans will be hunted. Your goal is to escape from this city.

Also it would like to start a small competition to make the game more fun. Try to get a score as low (not negative high) as possible and post a screenshot of it. The winner at the end of the voting-phade will be added somehow ingame.

The controls are pretty simple:

You move with ‘A’ and ‘D’ or the left and right arrow key and you jump with ‘C’

Known issues:

The character sometimes can get stuck on a wall or more often on the floor. In this situations just try to jump over the floor and release all keys on the wall.

You can ride a moving platform by sticking on her.

The “Start Game”-Button works for some reason only once.

Now good luck and have fun :)
